item.title: My participation in the Appwrite Hackathon on DEV 2022
item.description: About the event The Appwrite Hackathon on DEV was announced on April 12th and consisted of building an application under one set of categories. One of those categories was Mobile apps, and in order to participate, I created an app using their SDK and I created a post on the Dev.to where it should include a description of the project, public repository and evidence of how it works. ðŸ”— More info about the event
